sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A manual or miscellany of meditations, apothegms, sentences, precepts, observations, characters, and essayes Necessary for every ones contemplation. By R. R.
12[1] [i.e. 141], [3] p.
printed for Nath. Brook, at the Angel in Cornhill, London : 1658.
Last two pages of text (F10v, F11r) numbered in error: 120-12[1]; F10r numbered 139. With errata at foot of F11r, and three final pages of advertisments. Signatures: A-F¹² . Running title: A manual, or miscellany of meditations, apothegms, and essays. Copy stained with print show-through. Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
=======
